scripts.build: pegjs -e "(typeof module==='object'?module:this.\$interpol=this.\$interpol||{})[typeof module==='object'?'exports':'parser']" lib/parser.pegjs && nodeunit test/index.js && cat lib/interpol.js lib/resolvers/system.js lib/resolvers/helper.js lib/resolvers/memory.js > js/interpol.js && uglifyjs --preamble "`cat doc/preamble.js`" js/interpol.js -o js/interpol.min.js && uglifyjs --preamble "`cat doc/preamble.js`" lib/parser.js -o js/interpol-parser.min.js
